comment.author: Rockie
comment.text: CHINA, the top buyer of US Treasury securities, cut its holding in August for three months running, the latest data from the US Treasury Department showed. China shed its holding of US treasuries by US$33.7 billion in August, with the total holding down to US$1.19 trillion. The country has cut its treasuries holding for three consecutive months. Japan, the second-largest foreign holder of US treasuries, also cut its holding by US$10.6 billion to US$1.14 trillion in August. At the end of August, overall foreign holdings of US Treasury securities fell to US$6.19 trillion from July's US$6.25 trillion. http://www.shanghaidaily.com/business/finance/China-cuts-US-debt-holding/shdaily.shtml

replies.author: Rockie
replies.text: What does this mean? China and Japan do not believe HRC is going to win this election. There are private polls in every state. Being paid for by someone. Now if you own 6.25 Trillion of U.S. Debt Ooops now 6.19 Trillion wouldn't you want to know who going to win this election? Lets see, I think I'd spend 100-200 million to do the private polling, don't you! Sincerely yours Rockie

replies.author: Rockie
replies.text: This market is on the verge of collapse
